abstractText: A single palm-leaf folio of un unidentified work. This fragment seems to contain the beginning of a Buddhist text, as the initial invocation reads "oṃ namo bhagavate ārye prajñe" in Nepālākṣara, in a rather coarse hand. The recto is blank, except for an almost illegible line in what seems to be Bengali script in a much more refined hand.

title: Unidentified Fragment
